how do i turn of precision mode on ps4 bcuz its on atm while im flying and that makes it so my spaceship turn the way precision mode thing is pointing to.

i already tried holding L1

am using radial controls if that matters

 

i tried opening the map by doing L1+R1

but held L1 too long

I belive its L1+L3 for cursor preset. There is a list of controls in the options menu or on the right screenside is an app with an joystick that should also give u a list of controls for your preset. As far as i know precision mode just locks the inputs in the Enhanced Edition at this moment

Im home now and changed the preset to radial, i cant get into precision mode at all. Are the indicators for Pitch,roll and yaw Blue or do u have a Second set of indicators in pink? If u have pink ones its Trim and u can get rid of that with L1+L3 in radial
